description: This value set contract specific codes for action status.
name: ContractResourceActionStatusCodes

text.div:
Each definition includes usage notes explaining the precedence order in contract lifecycle - i.e., while only some stages are required, the order in which they may occur is deterministic; and a map to comparable FHIR and v.3 status codes. It follows guidance about use of status codes in FHIR at http://build.fhir.org/sc.html.

Contract Resource Action Status codes

This value set contract specific codes for action status.

Copyright Statement: HL7 International.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/contract-action-status defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
complete CompleteTo be completed

title: Contract Resource Action Status codes
